1: 1.	Despite the countless obstacles and challenges that life threw my way, I never lost hope, always pushing forward with unwavering determination, knowing that every small victory was a step closer to achieving the dreams I had worked so tirelessly to realize.
2: 2.	It’s genuinely disheartening to see how some people can be so inconsiderate and selfish, completely disregarding the feelings of others, even when it’s painfully obvious that their actions are causing harm and distress to those around them.
3: 3.	The sheer excitement that filled the air as the long-awaited concert finally began was absolutely electrifying, with thousands of fans screaming in unison and the band giving their all to deliver a performance that would be remembered for years to come.
4: 4.	After investing countless hours and pouring my heart and soul into this project, it’s incredibly frustrating to see it fail due to circumstances beyond my control, leaving me feeling helpless and deeply disappointed in the outcome.
5: 5.	As the sun dipped below the horizon, painting the sky with shades of pink and orange, I couldn’t help but feel a profound sense of peace wash over me, knowing that in this fleeting moment, all my worries seemed to fade away.
12: Created with ❤️ by Axel & Asser. Built using BERT and Streamlit.
